text: The Battle of Goma was a military campaign launched by the March 23 Movement (M23) Congolese rebel group against the regional capital of Goma in the Democratic Republic of the Congo (DRC). The battle is part of the larger M23 offensive in the North and South Kivu provinces of the DRC. ==Notes== ==References== Category:January 2025 events Category:February 2025 events Category:2025 in Africa Category:2020s in the Democratic Republic of the Congo Category:North Kivu
title: 2025 Goma offensive
